skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Kasumi, from the Asashio-class. During Operation Rei-go, my friends and I did our best to complete our missions. Without them, I would not have been able to accomplish anything alone.
skins.acquisition: I'm Kasumi. Commander, are you my friend?
skins.login: Hello, Commander. Foo, say hi to Commander too, okay?
skins.details: Kasumi can see lots of things that others can't, like Foo here, for example. Kasumi saw that Foo was all alone, so we became friends.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Foo is my good friend. We're always together.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Kasumi... gets tired easily... Commander, your chest is really comfortable.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Foo is always scared around Shiranui... Commander, is there no way to help Foo not be afraid of her will-o'-the-wisps...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, would you like to talk to Foo?

skins.shipDescription: Warm and comforting clothes... Warm and comforting red bean soup... Ahh, I love New Year's.
skins.acquisition: Warm and comforting clothes... Warm and comforting red bean soup... Ahh, I love New Year's.
skins.login: Commander, Happy New Year's. Would you like... some piping hot red bean soup?
skins.details: There's still a lot of the mochi Shiranui brought over... Commander, do you want some?
skins.secretaryIdle1: The mochi inside red bean soup... is delicious and fun to play with. Seconds, please~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Miss Ghost, would you like to be friends with Foo? ...Huh? You aren't really a ghost?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I hope a new horror movie comes out during New Year's. Commander, I'd like to watch one with you.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want some mochi? Say ahhn~
